statements: SELECT * FROM clinical_trials;
SELECT trial_id, treatment FROM clinical_trials WHERE outcome='Positive';
SELECT patient_id, outcome FROM clinical_trials WHERE treatment='Drug A';
SELECT * FROM clinical_trials ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT AVG(patient_id) AS average_patient_id FROM clinical_trials;
SELECT * FROM clinical_trials WHERE outcome = 'Success' ORDER BY trial_id DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT treatment, COUNT(*) as count FROM clinical_trials GROUP BY treatment HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT * FROM clinical_trials WHERE patient_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT trial_id, treatment FROM clinical_trials WHERE outcome = 'Failure' AND patient_id = 3 ORDER BY trial_id ASC
SELECT patient_id, MAX(trial_id) as max_trial_id FROM clinical_trials GROUP BY patient_id
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT treatment_name FROM treatments ORDER BY treatment_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM treatments WHERE outcome = 'Successful' ORDER BY treatment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT treatment_name, outcome FROM treatments ORDER BY treatment_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender, treatment_name, outcome FROM patients JOIN treatments ON patients.patient_id = treatments.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender, treatment_name, outcome FROM patients JOIN treatments ON patients.patient_id = treatments.patient_id WHERE age < 50 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients;
SELECT treatment_name, dosage, duration, side_effects FROM treatments;
SELECT result_id, patient_id, treatment_id, result_value, result_date FROM trial_results;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender, height, weight FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT treatment_name, dosage, duration, side_effects FROM treatments WHERE dosage > 10;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, height, weight FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT treatment_name, dosage, duration, side_effects FROM treatments WHERE dosage >= 50;

SELECT p.patient_name, t.treatment_name, tr.result_value, tr.result_date FROM patients p INNER JOIN trial_results tr ON p.patient_id = tr.patient_id INNER JOIN treatments t ON tr.treatment_id = t.treatment_id ORDER BY tr.result_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT trial_name, description FROM Trials ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT treatment_name, duration, cost FROM Treatments WHERE cost < 500 ORDER BY treatment_name;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Treatments WHERE cost > 5000;
SELECT patient_name, outcome_date FROM Patients INNER JOIN Outcomes ON Patients.patient_id = Outcomes.patient_id WHERE outcome = 'Successful';
SELECT t.trial_name, COUNT(*) as num_patients FROM Trials t INNER JOIN Patients p ON t.trial_id = p.trial_id GROUP BY t.trial_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT COUNT(patient_id) AS total_patients FROM patients;
SELECT trial_name, start_date, end_date FROM trials WHERE status='ongoing';
SELECT treatment_name, cost, effectiveness FROM treatments ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT name, age, condition FROM patients WHERE age > 45 ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT treatment_name, cost, duration FROM treatments WHERE cost > 100 ORDER BY cost ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT trial_name, start_date, end_date FROM trials WHERE status = 'ongoing' ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT outcome_value, outcome_date FROM outcomes WHERE outcome_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY outcome_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT milestone, milestone_date, is_completed FROM progress WHERE milestone = 'Phase 1' ORDER BY milestone_date DESC LIMIT 5;
